testsuite.name: griffon.plugins.datasource.DataSourceSpec

testcase.name: Open a connection to default dataSource
Can open a connection to default dataSource
Can open a connection to internal dataSource
Can open a connection to people dataSource
Bogus dataSource name (null) results in error
Bogus dataSource name () results in error
Bogus dataSource name (bogus) results in error
A runtime SQLException is thrown within dataSource handling
A runtime SQLException is thrown within connection handling
